title: Android 13 DP1 has new quick settings tiles, including a QR code shortcut
content:
Google dropped the first Developer Preview for Android 13 on Thursday, even though we’re still waiting on the release of Android 12L. There aren’t many new features in the initial Developer Preview, which is par for the course every year until we get to the Beta releases, but there are a few changes worth highlighting

The post Android 13 DP1 has new quick settings tiles, including a QR code shortcut appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The first Developer Preview of Android 13 includes four new quick settings tiles, including one that can open a QR code scanner.
